description: Core libraries providing cryptographic primitives and algorithms for application development
subcategories: General-purpose libraries, Language-specific libraries, Lightweight/embedded libraries
example_products: OpenSSL, BoringSSL, LibreSSL, Bouncy Castle, libsodium, wolfSSL, mbed TLS, Crypto++, NaCl, GnuTLS
primary_use_cases: Application encryption, Digital signatures, Key derivation, Hashing, Random number generation
typical_integration_points: Applications, APIs, Backend services, Mobile apps

description: Software for managing and interfacing with Hardware Security Modules
subcategories: HSM management consoles, PKCS#11 providers, HSM client libraries, Cloud HSM interfaces
example_products: Thales Luna HSM, Utimaco SecurityServer, Entrust nShield, AWS CloudHSM, Azure Dedicated HSM, Google Cloud HSM, Futurex KMES
primary_use_cases: Root key protection, Code signing, PKI operations, Payment processing, Database encryption keys
typical_integration_points: PKI systems, Key management, Payment gateways, Database encryption

description: Enterprise software for lifecycle management of cryptographic keys

primary_use_cases: Key generation, Key rotation, Key distribution, Secrets management, Policy enforcement
